metadata.title: Ray Allen Milwaukee Bucks Mitchell and Ness Men's Green Throwback Jesey
features: Size medium. Runs true to size, not loose
description: Represent your team and a legend at the same time by purchasing this hardwood classic jersey made by Mitchell & Ness. Former first round pick, 10 time all-star, and 2 time champion Ray Allen started his 19 year career with the Milwaukee Bucks making this a must have jersey!
